name: Lost at Archery Bootcamp
description:
A 2D Platformer / Side-Scroller with ranged combat. There are 4 Levels to navigate (including a bonus level.), to find a way out.

2D Side Scroller with some platforming sections. The game is about a kid who was dropped off at archery bootcamp, but could not find their way to the camp, so they are trying to find their way home. During this time they must defend themself against monsters at night using their bow and arrows.

There are 2 objectives;

  1. Don’t die, or u will start at level 1 again,
  2. Find a way out
    1. Here is the hidden portal in one of 3 three levels of the main game.
    2. You can beat the game in many ways ways including finding and finishing the bonus level (Finish defeating enough enemies and finding the portal)
    3. The game will end when you begin. . .  to find a way out. . .and succeed.
    4. You can beat the entire game without defeating a single enemy
    5. Until you find a way out the portals will loop you between levels. (Level A -> Level B -> Level C -> Level B (Or) Level A, and back again)
